System.​Windows.​Window
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​ToastNotification

Interaction logic for ToastNotification.xaml.  The ToastNotification window shows in the lower right hand corner of the screen as a toast notificaiton message to the user. This does not use the native Windows/other notification APIs.
